body:
This is failing 100% of macos tests on master.

```
 client credentials
      âœ“ Should accept SSL creds for a client: 6ms
    stderr: (node:18458) DeprecationWarning: grpc.load: Use the @grpc/proto-loader module with grpc.loadPackageDefinition instead
(node:18458) [DEP0005] DeprecationWarning: Buffer() is deprecated due to security and usability issues. Please use the Buffer.alloc(), Buffer.allocUnsafe(), or Buffer.from() methods instead.
    failed: true
    signal: SIGSEGV
    cmd: mocha /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/async_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/call_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/channel_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/client_interceptors_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/common_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/credentials_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/end_to_end_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/math_client_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/metadata_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/server_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/surface_test.js --colors --timeout=5000 --reporter=mocha-jenkins-reporter
    timedOut: false
Stack:
Error: Command failed: mocha /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/async_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/call_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/channel_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/client_interceptors_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/common_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/credentials_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/end_to_end_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/math_client_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/metadata_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/server_test.js /Volumes/BuildData/tmpfs/src/github/grpc/grpc-node/packages/grpc-native-core/test/surface_test.js --colors --timeout=5000 --reporter=mocha-jenkins-reporter
(node:18458) DeprecationWarning: grpc.load: Use the @grpc/proto-loader module with grpc.loadPackageDefinition instead
(node:18458) [DEP0005] DeprecationWarning: Buffer() is deprecated due to security and usability issues. Please use the Buffer.alloc(), Buffer.allocUnsafe(), or Buffer.from() methods instead.
```

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/168867fb-2050-4976-b432-a1cdde789c0c/log
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/7ae5a45e-244a-4716-9845-9f04fb335ef8/log
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/14cd7ae5-2e5c-46bf-95f4-4be97cacdfa0/log
It's failing 100% of linux tests too.
I have been able to reproduce this crash on my dev machine. It only happens on Node 10.12. So far I don't know what the cause is.

Update: the function that is segfaulting is `v8::Value::IsNativeError()`. The segfault happens whether or not the value is an error. Because this only happens one one specific version of Node, I believe this is a bug in Node itself. I will keep investigating.
